name: HackOp_wh1t3_l1ly
description:
Story

You are a cybersecurity specialist working for HackOp offices. Your job is to help secure your clients' networks by protecting them from external hackers.

One day, coming home from work, something interesting happens that might reverse your role...

Learn real hacking methods and test your cybersecurity skills in this story-driven puzzle adventure following the tracks left behind by a mysterious entity called "wh1t3_l1ly".

Features
  • Learn real hacking techniques and run real exploits. Discover the hacker within you!
  • In-game "hints and solutions" system guarantees you can complete every challenge and advance in the game
  • Plenty of hidden "hint tokens". Find them all!
  • Discover the mysterious story behind "wh1t3_l1ly"
Controls Roaming
  • A and D to move horizontally across the scenes
  • Left Click to interact with menus and game objects in the scenes
  • ESC to open up the menu
Terminal
  • Once you are interacting with the terminal, use your Keyboard to type commands
  • CTRL + C to copy selected text
  • CTRL + V to paste selected text
  • UP-ARROW and DOWN-ARROW to cycle through the used commands history
Tips
  • Don't be afraid to use the "hint and solutions" system if you ever get stuck!
  • Use the "help" command in the terminal to see the complete list of commands available in a challenge
Credits
  • Designed and Developed by Gabriele Zotti (LinkedIn, GitHub)
  • Game Art by Gabriele Zotti
  • Character Animation by Unknown (I don't remember where I found the sprite sheet. If you are the art owner, feel free to contact me to add you to the credits)
  • Background Music by Apoxode (CCMixter)
